Released react-rotary-knob Skin Pack ( 18 Skins )

Mar 12, 2018

Update: The skin pack is now open source, get it here

Last week I released version 1 of react-rotary-knob. One of the cool things of the component is the support for custom skins. Yesterday I released a Skin pack with 18 cool skins. The skins are JS modules that can be easily imported and customized (just set the skin attribute of the Knob to the imported module).

Get the skin pack
